00026 //----------------------------------------------------------
00027 int UTMessageSend( SOCKET socket, UT_message_t* message, SendProc sendProc )
00028 {
00030         unsigned int totalSize = UTMessageSize( message );
00031         if ( totalSize > UT_MAX_MESSAGE_SIZE )
00032                 return -1;
00033 
00034         B_ASSERT( totalSize >= 12 );
00035         B_ASSERT( message->code != UTMSG_INVALID );
00036 
00039         if ( message->offset >= totalSize )
00040                 return 1;
00041 
00043         int dataSent = ( *sendProc )( socket, ( const char* )message + message->offset, totalSize - message->offset, 0 );
00044         if ( dataSent == SOCKET_ERROR )
00045         {
00047                 if ( WSAGetLastError() == WSAEWOULDBLOCK )
00048                         return 0;
00049                 return -1;
00050         }
00051 
00053         message->offset += dataSent;
00054 
00056         return ( message->offset >= totalSize ) ? 1 : 0;
00057 }

00059 //----------------------------------------------------------
00060 int UTMessageRecv( UT_message_t* message, SOCKET socket, RecvProc recvProc, IoctlProc ioctlProc )
00061 {
00063         if ( message->code != UTMSG_INVALID && UTMessageReady( message ) )
00064                 return 1;
00065 
00067         unsigned long dataWaiting = 0;
00068         ( *ioctlProc )( socket, FIONREAD, &dataWaiting );
00069 
00071         if ( dataWaiting == 0 )
00072                 return 0;
00073 
00075         if ( message->offset < 12 )
00076         {
00078                 int headerBytes = Min( ( int )dataWaiting, 12 - ( int )message->offset );
00079 
00081                 int bytesReceived = ( *recvProc )( socket, ( char* )message + message->offset, headerBytes, 0 );
00082                 B_ASSERT( bytesReceived < 4 || message->code != 0 );
00083 
00085                 message->offset += bytesReceived;
00086 
00089                 dataWaiting -= bytesReceived;
00090                 if ( dataWaiting == 0 )
00091                 {
00093                         return 0;
00094                 }
00095         }
00096 
00098         unsigned int totalSize = UTMessageSize( message );
00099         unsigned int leftToRead = totalSize - message->offset;
00100 
00102         unsigned int readSize = Min( ( unsigned int )dataWaiting, leftToRead );
00103 
00105         int dataRead = ( *recvProc )( socket, ( char* )message + message->offset, readSize, 0 );
00106         if ( dataRead == SOCKET_ERROR )
00107         {
00109                 if ( WSAGetLastError() == WSAEWOULDBLOCK )
00110                         return 0;
00111 
00113                 return -1;
00114         }
00115 
00117         message->offset += ( unsigned int )dataRead;
00118 
00120         return ( message->offset == totalSize ) ? 1 : 0;
00121 }

00123 //----------------------------------------------------------
00124 void UTMessageInit( UT_message_t* message )
00125 {
00126         message->code = UTMSG_INVALID;
00127         message->dataSize = 0;
00128         message->offset = 0;
00129         message->transactionId = 0;
00130 }
00131 
00132 //----------------------------------------------------------
00133 bool UTMessageReady( const UT_message_t* message )
00134 {
00135         return ( ( message->code != UTMSG_INVALID ) && ( message->offset >= 12 ) &&
00136                 ( UTMessageSize( message ) == message->offset ) );
00137 }

00139 //----------------------------------------------------------
00140 bool UTMessageEmpty( const UT_message_t* message )
00141 {
00142         return ( message->code == UTMSG_INVALID );
00143 }

00145 //----------------------------------------------------------
00146 unsigned int UTMessageSize( const UT_message_t* message )
00147 {
00148         return message->dataSize + 12;
00149 }

00156                 return false;

00159         message->offset = 0;
00160 
00162         return true;

00177                 return false;
00178 
00180         *value = *( short* )( message->buffer + message->offset );
00181         message->offset += 2;
00182 
00184         return true;

00217 //----------------------------------------------------------
00218 bool UTMessageReadStr( char* buffer, int bufLen, UT_message_t* message )
00219 {
00221         short len = 0;
00222         if ( !UTMessageReadShort( &len, message ) )
00223                 return false;
00224 
00226         if ( ( message->offset + len ) > message->dataSize )
00227                 return false;
00228 
00230         bufLen -= 1;
00231 
00233         if ( bufLen > len )
00234                 bufLen = len;
00235 
00237         memcpy( buffer, message->buffer + message->offset, bufLen );
00238         buffer[ bufLen ] = 0;
00239 
00241         message->offset += len;
00242 
00244         return true;
00245 }

00248 //----------------------------------------------------------
00249 bool UTMessageDecompressData( void* buffer, int bufLen, UT_message_t* message )
00250 {
00252         int srcLen = 0;
00253         if ( !UTMessageReadInt( &srcLen, message ) )
00254                 return false;
00255 
00257 #if ZLIB_COMPRESSION
00258         unsigned long ulBufLen = bufLen;
00259         if ( uncompress( ( Bytef* )buffer, &ulBufLen, ( Bytef* )( message->buffer + message->offset ), srcLen ) != Z_OK )
00260                 return false;
00261 #else
00263         MemCopy( buffer, message->buffer + message->offset, srcLen );
00264 #endif
00265 
00267         return true;
00268 }

00354 //----------------------------------------------------------
00355 bool UTMessageWriteStr( UT_message_t* message, const char* str )
00356 {
00358         short len = ( short )strlen( str );
00359         if ( ( message->dataSize + len + 2 ) > UT_MAX_MESSAGE_SIZE )
00360                 return false;
00361 
00363         if ( !UTMessageWriteShort( message, len ) )
00364                 return false;
00365 
00367         memcpy( message->buffer + message->dataSize, str, len );
00368 
00370         message->dataSize += len;
00371 
00373         return true;
00374 }

00377 bool UTMessageWriteBytes( UT_message_t* message, const void* data, size_t len )
00378 {
00380         if( !data )
00381                 return false;
00382 
00384         if ( ( message->dataSize + len ) > UT_MAX_MESSAGE_SIZE )
00385                 return false;
00386 
00388         memcpy( message->buffer + message->dataSize, data, len );
00389 
00391         message->dataSize += ( unsigned int )len;
00392 
00394         return true;
00395 }

00397 //----------------------------------------------------------
00398 bool UTMessageCompressData( UT_message_t* message, const void* src, int srcSize )
00399 {
00401         char* sizeLoc = UTMessageReserveData( message, 4 );
00402         if ( !sizeLoc )
00403                 return false;
00404 
00406 #if ZLIB_COMPRESSION
00407         unsigned long dstSize = UT_MAX_MESSAGE_SIZE - message->dataSize;
00408         if ( compress2( ( Bytef* )message->buffer + message->dataSize, &dstSize, ( Bytef* )src, srcSize, Z_BEST_SPEED ) )
00409         {
00411                 message->dataSize -= 4;
00412 
00414                 return false;
00415         }
00416 #else
00418         unsigned long dstSize = srcSize;
00419         MemCopy( message->buffer + message->dataSize, src, srcSize );
00420 #endif
00422         *( unsigned long* )sizeLoc = dstSize;
00423 
00425         message->dataSize += ( unsigned int )dstSize;
00426 
00428         return true;
00429 }

00432 char* UTMessageReserveData( UT_message_t* message, int size )
00433 {
00435         if ( ( message->dataSize + size ) > UT_MAX_MESSAGE_SIZE )
00436                 return 0;
00437 
00439         char* start = message->buffer + message->dataSize;
00440         message->dataSize += size;
00441 
00443         return start;
00444 }

00446 //----------------------------------------------------------
00447 void UTMessageQueueCreate( UT_message_queue_t* queue, size_t size )
00448 {
00450         queue->messages = ( UT_message_t* )malloc( size * sizeof( UT_message_t ) );
00451         queue->size = size;
00452         queue->head = 0;
00453         queue->tail = 0;
00454 }
00455 
00456 //----------------------------------------------------------
00457 void UTMessageQueueExpand( UT_message_queue_t* queue, size_t size )
00458 {
00460         size += queue->size;
00461         UT_message_t* mem = ( UT_message_t* )malloc( size * sizeof( UT_message_t ) );
00462 
00464         UT_message_t* cur = mem;
00465         for ( size_t i = queue->tail; i < queue->head; ++i, ++cur )
00466                 *cur = queue->messages[ i % queue->size ];
00467 
00469         free( queue->messages );
00470 
00472         queue->messages = mem;
00473         queue->head -= queue->tail;
00474         queue->tail = 0;
00475         queue->size = size;
00476 }

00478 //----------------------------------------------------------
00479 void UTMessageQueueDestroy( UT_message_queue_t* queue )
00480 {
00482         free( queue->messages );
00483         queue->size = 0;
00484         queue->head = 0;
00485         queue->tail = 0;
00486 }

00488 //----------------------------------------------------------
00489 UT_message_t* UTMessageQueueAdd( UT_message_queue_t* queue )
00490 {
00492         size_t count = queue->head - queue->tail;
00493 
00495         if ( count >= queue->size )
00496                 return 0;
00497 
00499         UT_message_t* message = queue->messages + ( queue->head++ % queue->size );
00500 
00502         UTMessageInit( message );
00503 
00505         return message;
00506 }

00508 //----------------------------------------------------------
00509 UT_message_t* UTMessageQueueRemove( UT_message_queue_t* queue )
00510 {
00512         if ( queue->tail < queue->head )
00513                 return queue->messages + ( queue->tail++ % queue->size );
00514 
00516         return 0;
00517 }
00518 
00519 //----------------------------------------------------------
00520 UT_message_t* UTMessageQueueTop( UT_message_queue_t* queue )
00521 {
00523         if ( queue->tail < queue->head )
00524                 return queue->messages + ( ( queue->head - 1 ) % queue->size );
00525 
00527         return 0;
00528 }
00529 
00530 //----------------------------------------------------------
00531 UT_message_t* UTMessageQueuePeek( UT_message_queue_t* queue, size_t message )
00532 {
00534         if ( ( queue->tail + message ) < queue->head )
00535                 return queue->messages + ( ( queue->tail + message ) % queue->size );
00536 
00538         return 0;
00539 }

00541 //----------------------------------------------------------
00542 size_t UTMessageQueueCount( UT_message_queue_t* queue )
00543 {
00545         return ( queue->head - queue->tail );
00546 }
00547 
00548 //----------------------------------------------------------
00549 bool UTMessageQueueFull( UT_message_queue_t* queue )
00550 {
00552         return ( ( queue->head - queue->tail ) >= queue->size );
00553 }

00555 //----------------------------------------------------------
00556 void UTMessageQueueClear( UT_message_queue_t* queue )
00557 {
00559         queue->head = 0;
00560         queue->tail = 0;
00561 }

00563 //----------------------------------------------------------
00564 int UTMessageQueueSend( SOCKET socket, UT_message_queue_t* queue, char* buf,
00565                                             size_t bufSize,
00566                                                 int* bytesSent, SendProc sendProc )
00567 {
00569         size_t count = UTMessageQueueCount( queue );
00570 
00572         if ( count == 0 )
00573                 return 1;
00574 
00575         size_t offset = 0;
00576         for ( size_t i = 0; i < count; ++i )
00577         {
00579                 UT_message_t* toSend = UTMessageQueuePeek( queue, i );
00580 
00582                 unsigned int curSize = UTMessageSize( toSend ) - toSend->offset;
00583                 size_t newOffset = offset + curSize;
00584 
00586                 if ( newOffset > bufSize )
00587                         break;
00588 
00590                 MemCopy( buf + offset, ( unsigned char* )toSend + toSend->offset, curSize );
00591 
00593                 offset = newOffset;
00594         }
00595 
00597         int dataSent = ( *sendProc )( socket, buf, ( int )offset, 0 );
00598         if ( dataSent == SOCKET_ERROR )
00599         {
00601                 if ( WSAGetLastError() == WSAEWOULDBLOCK )
00602                         return 0;
00603                 return -1;
00604         }
00605 
00607         if ( bytesSent )
00608                 *bytesSent = dataSent;
00609 
00611         while ( dataSent )
00612         {
00614                 UT_message_t* cur = UTMessageQueuePeek( queue );
00615 
00617                 int curSize = UTMessageSize( cur ) - cur->offset;
00618                 if ( curSize <= dataSent )
00619                 {
00621                         UTMessageQueueRemove( queue );
00622                         dataSent -= curSize;
00623                 }
00624                 else
00625                 {
00628                         cur->offset += dataSent;
00629                         dataSent = 0;
00630                 }
00631         }
00632 
00635         return ( UTMessageQueueCount( queue ) == 0 ) ? 1 : 0;
00636 }

00737                 }

00739                         top = UTMessageQueueAdd( queue );
00740 
00741         }
00742         while ( top && UTMessageRecv( top, socket, recvProc, ioctlProc ) == 1 );
00743 
00744         if ( bytesReceived && top && top->code != UTMSG_INVALID )
00745                 *bytesReceived += top->offset;
